title: Help FPS drops no matter what I do!
body: In the beginning of a ranked game my FPS was all over the place. And during the game I tried alot of things to try and fix it. I lowered all my graphics settings and it still did the same thing. After the game I ran the game repair option and that did not help. I  even turned my computer off and on several times with no solution to my problem. if there is anything else I can do please help me. Will be much appreciate!!

replies.body: FPS drops are sometimes caused by software issues like a missed driver update. If your graphics driver is out of date, for example, it can cause fps stutters because it's having a hard time rendering the graphics. Check out the steps in our [FPS Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)) to see if we can stabilize those frames!

I have updated all my drivers and I am in the progress of reinstalling league. I have tried the fixing option which didn't seem to help. and my other games are running as normal so I will see if this will fix it.

Update: I am still having the same problem all my drivers are up to date and I completely reinstalled league :/
I am going to try and rollback my graphics driver to see if that will help.
Theres something wrong from riot not ur Pc. But they cant admit it
